00052 void selectionFinishCallback( void * userData, SoSelection* selection )
00053 {
00054         GraphicRoot* root = static_cast< GraphicRoot* >( userData  );
00055     if ( root ) root->SelectionChanged( selection );
00056 }
00057 
00058 GraphicRoot::GraphicRoot()
00059 :m_graphicsRoot( 0 ),
00060  m_pGrid( 0 ),
00061  m_pRays( 0 ),
00062  m_pRootTransform( 0 ),
00063  m_pSceneSeparator( 0 ),
00064  m_pSelectionNode( 0 ),
00065  m_pTracker( 0 )
00066 {
00067         m_graphicsRoot = new SoSeparator;
00068 
00069         SoVRMLBackground* vrmlBackground = new SoVRMLBackground;
00070         float gcolor[][3] = { {0.9843f, 0.8862f, 0.6745f},{ 0.7843f, 0.6157f, 0.4785f } };
00071         float gangle= 1.570f;
00072         vrmlBackground->groundColor.setValues( 0, 6, gcolor );
00073         vrmlBackground->groundAngle.setValue( gangle );
00074         float scolor[][3] = { {0.0157f, 0.0235f, 0.4509f}, {0.5569f, 0.6157f, 0.8471f} };
00075         float sangle= 1.570f;
00076         vrmlBackground->skyColor.setValues( 0,6,scolor );
00077         vrmlBackground->skyAngle.setValue( sangle );
00078         m_graphicsRoot->addChild( vrmlBackground );
00079 
00080         m_pSceneSeparator = new SoSeparator;
00081         m_graphicsRoot->addChild( m_pSceneSeparator );
00082 
00083         m_pRootTransform = new SoTransform;
00084         m_pSceneSeparator->addChild( m_pRootTransform );
00085 
00086         m_pTracker = new GraphicRootTracker;
00087         m_pTracker->ref();
00088 
00089         m_pTracker->ConnectParentTranform(m_pRootTransform);
00090 
00091         /*m_pRootTransform->translation.connectFrom( &m_pTracker->outputTranslation );
00092         m_pRootTransform->rotation.connectFrom( &m_pTracker->outputRotation );
00093         m_pRootTransform->scaleFactor.connectFrom( &m_pTracker->outputScaleFactor );
00094         m_pRootTransform->scaleOrientation.connectFrom( &m_pTracker->outputScaleOrientation );
00095         m_pRootTransform->center.connectFrom( &m_pTracker->outputCenter );*/
00096 
00097         m_pSelectionNode = new SoSelection;
00098         m_pSelectionNode->ref();
00099         m_pSelectionNode->policy = SoSelection::SINGLE;
00100         m_pSelectionNode->addFinishCallback( selectionFinishCallback, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
00101         m_pSceneSeparator->addChild( m_pSelectionNode );
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105 }
00106 
00107 GraphicRoot::~GraphicRoot()
00108 {
00109         if ( m_pSelectionNode ) m_pSelectionNode->unref();
00110         if ( m_pGrid ) m_pGrid->unref();
00111         if ( m_pRays ) m_pRays->unref();
00112         if( m_pRootTransform ) m_pRootTransform->unref();
00113         if( m_pTracker )        m_pTracker->unref();
00114         if ( m_graphicsRoot ) m_graphicsRoot->unref();
00115 
00116 }
00117 
00118 void GraphicRoot::AddGrid( SoSeparator* grid )
00119 {
00120         //RemoveGrid();
00121         m_pGrid = grid;
00122         grid->ref();
00123 }
00124 
00125 void GraphicRoot::AddRays( SoSeparator* rays )
00126 {
00127         RemoveRays();
00128         m_pRays = rays;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void GraphicRoot::AddModel( TSceneKit* sceneModel )
00132 {
00133         if( sceneModel )
00134         {
00135                 m_pSelectionNode->addChild( sceneModel );
00136                 m_pTracker->SetSceneKit( sceneModel );
00137                 m_pTracker->SetAzimuthAngle( &sceneModel->azimuth );
00138                 m_pTracker->SetZenithAngle( &sceneModel->zenith );
00139         }
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 void GraphicRoot::DeselectAll()
00144 {
00145         m_pSelectionNode->deselectAll();
00146 }
00147 
00148 SoSeparator* GraphicRoot::GetNode() const
00149 {
00150         return m_graphicsRoot;
00151 }
00152 
00153 void GraphicRoot::RemoveGrid()
00154 {
00155         if( m_pGrid )
00156         {
00157                 ShowGrid( false );
00158                 m_pGrid->removeAllChildren();
00159                 std::cout<<"m_pGrid: "<<m_pGrid->getRefCount()<<std::endl;
00160                 while( m_pGrid->getRefCount() > 1 ) m_pGrid->unref();
00161                 if ( m_pGrid->getRefCount() > 1 ) tgf::SevereError( "RemoveGrid: m_pGrid referenced in excess ");
00162                 m_pGrid->unref();
00163                 m_pGrid = 0;
00164         }
00165 
00166 }
00167 
00168 void GraphicRoot::RemoveRays()
00169 {
00170         if( m_pRays )
00171         {
00172                 m_pRays->removeAllChildren();
00173                 if ( m_pRays->getRefCount() > 1 ) tgf::SevereError( "RemoveRays: m_pRays referenced in excess ");
00174                 m_pRays->unref();
00175                 m_pRays = 0;
00176         }
00177 
00178 }
00179 
00180 void GraphicRoot::RemoveModel()
00181 {
00182         if( m_pSelectionNode->getNumChildren() > 0 )
00183         {
00184                 m_pTracker->SetSceneKit( 0 );
00185                 m_pTracker->Disconnect();
00186 
00187                 m_pSelectionNode->removeAllChildren();
00188         }
00189 }
00190 
00191 void GraphicRoot::Select(const SoPath* path )
00192 {
00193         m_pSelectionNode->select( path );
00194         m_pSelectionNode->touch();
00195 
00196 }
00197 
00198 void GraphicRoot::SelectionChanged( SoSelection* selection )
00199 {
00200     emit ChangeSelection( selection );
00201 
00202 }

00204 void GraphicRoot::ShowBackground( bool view )
00205 {
00206         SoVRMLBackground* vrmlBackground = static_cast< SoVRMLBackground* > ( m_graphicsRoot->getChild( 0 ) );
00207 
00208         if( view )
00209         {
00210                 float gcolor[][3] = { {0.9843f, 0.8862f, 0.6745f}, {0.7843f, 0.6157f, 0.4785f} };
00211                 float gangle= 1.570f;
00212 
00213                 vrmlBackground->groundColor.setValues( 0, 6, gcolor );
00214                 vrmlBackground->groundAngle.setValue( gangle );
00215                 float scolor[][3] = { {0.0157f, 0.0235f, 0.4509f}, {0.5569f, 0.6157f, 0.8471f} };
00216                 float sangle= 1.570f;
00217                 vrmlBackground->skyColor.setValues( 0,6,scolor );
00218                 vrmlBackground->skyAngle.setValue( sangle );
00219         }
00220         else
00221         {
00222                 float color[][3] = { {0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f}, {0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f} };
00223                 float angle= 1.570f;
00224                 vrmlBackground->groundColor.setValues( 0, 6, color );
00225                 vrmlBackground->groundAngle.setValue( angle );
00226                 vrmlBackground->skyColor.setValues( 0,6,color );
00227                 vrmlBackground->skyAngle.setValue( angle );
00228         }
00229 
00230 }
00231 
00232 void GraphicRoot::ShowGrid( bool view )
00233 {
00234         if( view && m_pGrid )
00235                 m_graphicsRoot->addChild( m_pGrid );
00236         else if( !view )
00237                 if ( m_pGrid->getRefCount( ) > 0 )      m_graphicsRoot->removeChild( m_pGrid );
00238 
00239 }
00240 
00241 void GraphicRoot::ShowRays( bool view )
00242 {
00243         if( view && ( m_pRays ) )
00244                 m_pSceneSeparator->addChild( m_pRays );
00245         else if( !view )
00246                 if ( m_pRays->getRefCount( ) > 0 )      m_pSceneSeparator->removeChild( m_pRays );
00247 }
